question: What is my daily transaction limit?
answer: Your daily transaction limit depends on your account tier. Basic accounts have a limit of £1,000 per day, Premium accounts have £5,000 per day, and Metal accounts have £10,000 per day. You can check your current limit in the app under Settings > Limits.

question: How do I block or unblock my card?
answer: To block your card, go to the Cards section in the app, select your card, and tap 'Freeze Card'. To unblock it, simply tap 'Unfreeze Card' in the same location. You can also block your card temporarily if you've misplaced it and unblock it when you find it. Blocked cards cannot be used for any transactions.

question: How long do international transfers take?
answer: International transfers typically take 1-3 business days depending on the destination country and currency. Transfers to countries within the SEPA zone (European countries) usually arrive within 1 business day. For other countries, it may take 2-3 business days. You can track the status of your transfer in the app under Transfers.
